location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: coloured ink on tracing linen.Dimensions: 295 x 455mm, on sheet: 260 x 440mm.

mods.abstract: A sketch map showing the direction of the attack led by the Imam of Oman, Salim Bin Rashid al-Kharusi, and his followers on Bait al-Falaj. The map is an illustration of a report sent by the Political Agent, Muscat, Lieutenant Colonel Robert Arthur Edward Benn to the Political Residency, Bushire.
